tasks.instruction:
Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the FleetXchange platform. The platform needs three main portals:

1. Admin Portal - Approve/reject registrations for clients, transporters, trucks, and drivers. Manage document verification including company registration certificates, shareholders extract, directors' IDs, bank confirmation letters, application letters, VAT certificates, import documents, tax clearance, signed KYC forms for clients & transporters. For trucks: blue book copy, lease agreements, trailer documents. For drivers: valid driver's license, medical certificate (12 months), police clearance. Monitor posted loads and active bids. Provide simple reporting on users, verified documents, loads posted/completed.

2. Client Portal - Register and upload company documents for verification. Post load requests with cargo details, pickup & delivery locations, tonnage, budget. View and select bids from transporters. Direct messaging system with transporters for specific loads. Dashboard to track load status and assigned transporters.

3. Transporter Portal - Register and upload company, truck, and driver documents for verification. View available loads and place bids with price and truck availability. View bid results (won/lost). Assign verified truck and driver for won bids. Direct messaging system with clients for posted loads.

MVP Priorities: User registration & document verification, load posting & bidding system, messaging portal (basic text-only per load/bid), simplified dashboards for each portal.

Include competitive analysis of similar logistics platforms, market research on freight management systems, user personas for admins/clients/transporters, technical requirements for document management and verification workflows, and detailed feature specifications.

Design a comprehensive system architecture for the FleetXchange platform based on the PRD. The system needs to handle three distinct user portals (Admin, Client, Transporter) with role-based access control, document upload and verification workflows, bidding system, messaging system, and dashboard functionality. Design the database schema for users, documents, loads, bids, messages, and verification status. Include authentication and authorization system, file storage architecture for document management, real-time features for bidding and messaging, and scalable backend architecture. Output complete system design including database design, API structure, security considerations, and technology recommendations.

Implement the complete FleetXchange platform based on the system design. Build three separate portals (Admin, Client, Transporter) with role-based authentication, document upload and verification system, load posting and bidding functionality, messaging system between clients and transporters, and dashboards for each user type. Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for the frontend. Implement proper state management, form validation, file upload handling, real-time updates for bids and messages, and responsive design for all portals. Include proper error handling and user feedback throughout the application.
